text: Thanks <@U05R380MLMC> my colleague come up with it after spending a year in Australia :koala: Did you now that koalas are the only non-primates that have fingerprints just like humans? These *fingerprints can be used to uniquely identify them*. In a similar way, Koalify can be used to identify unique records in HubSpot! :wink:
that is a really cool analogy!
